ARABIC: وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْخَٰسِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And on no account be among those who deny Allah's Signs and so become one of the lost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And do not be one of those who deny the signs of God, or you will be among the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: or reject the signs of Allah as false, for then you shall be among those who will be in utter loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: nor be of those who have called God's revelations lies lest you become lost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And never be of those who denied the signs of Allah, for you will then be of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And be not one of those who belie the Ayat of Allah, for then you shall be one of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And you should not be of those who reject the communications of Allah, (for) then you should be one of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: nor be of those who cry lies to God's signs so as to be of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And be not thou of those who deny the revelations of Allah, for then wert thou of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: do not be one who rejects God's signs, for then you would become one of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And be not thou of those who belie Allah's signs, lest thou be of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And do not be of those who deny the signs of Allah, [for] then you shall be among the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor be of those who reject the signs of Allah, or thou shalt be of those who perish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And be not one of those who belie the Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) of Allah, for then you shall be one of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not be among those who belie the verses of Allah, for then you would be among the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And do not be of those who deny God’s revelations, lest you become one of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And never be of those who deny the signs of Allah and [thus] be among the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:95] And do not be of those who deny God’s signs and so be of the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And be not thou of those who deny the revelations of Allah) Allah's Book and Messenger, (for then wert thou of the losers)
